The acceptance probability has the form
$$
\begin{align}
P(U \le  \frac{f(y)}{cg(y)}) &=  \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \int_0^{\frac{f(y)}{cg(y)}}  f_{U,Y} (y,u) du dy \\
&=  \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \int_0^{\frac{f(y)}{cg(y)}} 1\cdot g(y)   du dy \\
&=  1/c
\end{align}
$$
